products.name: Widget 1
products.descr: Widget 1 is pretty amazing in that it's very cheap. It will break in about an hour, but, hey, that's what you're paying for.

products.name: Widget 2
products.descr: Widget 2 is halfway between none at all and the most expensive. It's okay quality and should last a mediocre amount of time.

products.name: Widget 3
products.descr: Widget 3 is for those who want something slightly better than Widget 1 but still don't want to spend too much.

products.name: Widget 4
products.descr: Widget 4 is of nicer quality but doesn't put as much of a strain on a tight budget.

products.name: Widget 5
products.descr: Widget 3 is the highest quality and should keep for a long time.
